Interrupts.Name: Protect the Child
Interrupts.Description: At the start of combat, the Banderhobb chooses a foe, deciding it's a child to be protected.
Interrupts.Trigger: A character ends their turn adjacent to the chosen character, or deals damage with an ability to that character.
Interrupts.Effects: The Hob teleports to an adjacent space as an effect, then swipes that character. Other hobs are shoved 1 and take no damage. All other characters take [D]+[fray] damage. This effect ends if the Banderhobb's target deals damage to it in any way. If the effect ends, the Banderhobb can immediately choose a character to protect, but can't choose any target it's already chosen this combat.

Actions.Name: Savage Swipes
Actions.Effects: If there's only one valid character in range, increase damage to 2[D]+[fray] on hit.

Actions.Name: Bounding Leaps
Actions.Effects: If it lands on an object or adjacent to a character, it can repeat this flight once more.

Actions.Name: Pounce
Actions.Description: The hob flies 4, then an adjacent foe is slowed and must save or take [D]+[fray], twice, or [D]+[fray] on a successful save.
